と言う訳だ: (というわけだ) - this is why; this means; it is the case that
と言えど: (といえど) - be (that) as it may; having said that
と言えなくもない: (といえなくもない) - (one) could even say that
と言えなくも無い: (といえなくもない) - (one) could even say that
と言った: (といった) - such ... as; or some such
と言ったら嘘になる: (といったらうそになる) - I'd be lying if I said ...
と言ってしまえばそれまで: (といってしまえばそれまで) - it is certain true that ... (but); you can't argue that it's not ... (but)
と言っても: (といっても) - although I say; although one might say; although called
と言ってもいい: (といってもいい) - you could say; you might say; verging on the
と言っても良い: (といってもよい) - you could say; you might say; verging on the
と言っても過言ではない: (といってもかごんではない) - it is no exaggeration to say; it is not too much to say
と言われる: (といわれる) - to be called ...; to be referred to as ...
どう: (どう) - whoa (command used to stop a horse, etc.)
どういう風の吹き回しか: (どういうかぜのふきまわしか) - whatever brought that on?
どうかした: (どうかして) - by mere chance; by some chance; somehow or other; in some way
どうかしたのか: (どうかしたんですか) - is something up?; is something wrong?
どうかしたのですか: (どうかしたんですか) - is something up?; is something wrong?
どうかしたんですか: (どうかしたんですか) - is something up?; is something wrong?
どうかして: (どうかして) - by mere chance; by some chance; somehow or other; in some way
どうかしている: (どうかしている) - something wrong with (someone); not oneself; crazy; nuts
どうかしら: (どうかしら) - I don't know ...; How about ...? I wonder; What about ..?
どうかすると: (どうかすると) - there is a tendency; there is a possibility
どうかと思う: (どうかとおもう) - to doubt; to have a problem with; to think badly of
どうかと言うと: (どうかというと) - if you ask me ...; as for ...
どうかな: (どうかな) - how about ...?; I wonder/I don't know
どうこう: (どうこう) - this and that; one thing or another
どうしたって: (どうしたって) - by all means; no matter what; at any rate
どうしたの: (どうしたん) - what's the matter?; what's wrong?
どうしたもの: (どうしたもん) - what's up with; what's the deal with; what's to be done with
どうしたもん: (どうしたもん) - what's up with; what's the deal with; what's to be done with
どうしたら: (どうしたら) - how can (one) do something
どうしたらいい: (どうしたらいい) - (exp,adj-ix) what's the best thing to do?
どうしたら良い: (どうしたらよい) - what's the best thing to do?
どうしたん: (どうしたん) - what's the matter?; what's wrong?
どうした風の吹き回しか: (どうしたかぜのふきまわしか) - whatever brought that on?
どうしてる: (どうしてる) - How did you like ...?; How about ...?; What's going on?; How's it going?
どうしますか: (どうしますか) - what would (you) do?; what to do about it
どうするか: (どうしますか) - what would (you) do?; what to do about it
どうせ: (どうせ) - anyhow/in any case/at any rate/after all/at all/no matter what; at best/at most
どうせなら: (どうせなら) - (if you want to do something) you might as well
どうぞ: (どうぞ) - please/kindly/I beg of you; by all means/feel free/you are welcome; (previously written as 何卒) here you are
どうぞ宜しく: (どうぞよろしく) - pleased to meet you
どうだい: (どうだい) - How did you like ...?; How about ...?; What's going on?; How's it going?
どうだっていい: (どうでもよい) - inconsequential; indifferent; not worth worrying about; whatever you do is OK; trivial
どうってことはない: (どうってことはない) - nothing special; no big deal; doesn't matter
どうであろうと: (どうであろうと) - whatever (the case may be)
どうでも: (どうでも) - anyway/anyhow/as one likes; by all means/at any cost/no matter what it takes
どうでもいい: (どうでもよい) - inconsequential; indifferent; not worth worrying about; whatever you do is OK; trivial
どうでもよい: (どうでもよい) - inconsequential; indifferent; not worth worrying about; whatever you do is OK; trivial
どうと: (どうど) - crash; smash; bang; sound of a large, heavy object falling
どうという事はない: (どうということはない) - nothing special; no big deal; doesn't matter
どうという事もない: (どうということもない) - nothing special; no big deal; doesn't matter
どうど: (どうど) - crash; smash; bang; sound of a large, heavy object falling
どうどう: (どうどう) - with a roaring sound (of water or wind)/sound of feet stamping on the ground; whoa! (command used to stop or quieten down a horse, etc.)
どうなるものでもない: (どうなるものでもない) - can't help; won't make much difference
どうにか: (どうにか) - in some way or other; one way or another
どうにかこうにか: (どうにかこうにか) - somehow or other
どうにかして: (どうにかして) - by any means (possible); somehow
どうにもならない: (どうにもならない) - helpless; futile; situation about which nothing can be done
どうも: (どうも) - thanks; much (thanks)/very (sorry)/quite (regret); quite/really/mostly; somehow; (in positive sense, esp. どうも〜しまう)  in spite of oneself/no matter how hard one may try (one is unable to) (with negative verb)/no matter how hard one may try not to (one ends up doing) (with positive verb, esp. -shimau); greetings/hello/goodbye
どうも有難う: (どうもありがとう) - Thank you
どうも有難うございます: (どうもありがとうございます) - thank you very much
どうやったら: (どうやったら) - how (can); by what means
どうやったらいい: (どうやったらいい) - what one should do (usu. in questions)
どうやって: (どうやって) - how; in what way; by what means
どうやら: (どうやら) - it seems like/it appears that; somehow or other
どうやらこうやら: (どうやらこうやら) - somehow or other
どうれ: (どうれ) - (used by samurai families)  welcome; come in; response to a visitor at one's house who has asked to be shown inside
どう仕様もない: (どうしようもない) - it cannot be helped; there is no other way
どう仕様も無い: (どうしようもない) - it cannot be helped; there is no other way
どう致しまして: (どういたしまして) - you are welcome; don't mention it; not at all; my pleasure
どう見ても: (どうみても) - to all appearances; no matter how you look at it
どう言う: (どういう) - somehow; how; in what way; why; what kind of
どう言う風に: (どうゆうふうに) - in what way (do you mean)
どかっと: (どかと) - thuddingly; plumping down (like a heavy weight)
どかと: (どかと) - thuddingly; plumping down (like a heavy weight)
どかどか: (どかどか) - noisily/with loud footsteps; in a crowd/incessantly/all together
どか食い: (どかぐい) - eating a lot; excessive eating
どが付く: (どがつく) - to be (something) very much; to be an extreme (something)
どきっと: (どきんと) - feeling a shock; startling
どきつく: (どきつく) - to palpitate (with anxiety, etc.)
どきどき: (ドキンドキン) - thump-thump/bang-bang/pit-a-pat/pitapat/pitter-patter; to beat fast (of one's heart)/to throb/to pound/to palpitate
どきり: (ドッキリ) - feeling shocked or startled
どきんと: (どきんと) - feeling a shock; startling
どきんどきん: (ドキンドキン) - thump-thump/bang-bang/pit-a-pat/pitapat/pitter-patter; to beat fast (of one's heart)/to throb/to pound/to palpitate
どぎつい: (どぎつい) - gaudy; loud; garish; violent; harsh
どぎまぎ: (どぎまぎ) - flurried; in a flutter; upset; nervous; embarrassed
